assetProfile.address2: 8th Floor Cello Platina Fergusson College Road, Shivajinagar
assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Kirloskar Industries Limited manufactures and sells iron castings in India. It generates and sells wind-power electricity through seven windmills with total installed capacity of 5.6 megawatts in Maharashtra; owns lands and building, and apartments and offices; and invests in properties and securities. The company was formerly known as Kirloskar Oil Engines Limited and changed its name to Kirloskar Industries Limited in March 2010. The company was incorporated in 1978 and is based in Pune, India.
